occurrenceSearch.description: Search for occurrences in Global Biodiversity Information Facility. Free and Open Access to Biodiversity Data.
occurrenceSearch.failedSearch: Your filters might be invalid or the servers having issues. Please try again and report the issue if it continues
occurrenceSearch.imageLicenseInfo: Be aware that licenses applied to images may differ from those applied to occurrence records
occurrenceSearch.containsSuspicious: This map contains occurrences flagged by GBIF as having suspicious coordinates.
occurrenceSearch.polygonSimplifiedToFewerDecimals: The polygon has been simplified to fewer decimals
occurrenceSearch.polygonSimplifiedToFewerPoints: The polygon has been simplified to fewer points
occurrenceSearch.largeQueryLengthWarning: You are using a very large query. Be aware that this will not work in all browsers. A better option is to use the download API for such queries.
